name: Megnax
description:
Our services encompass a wide paradigm of Web Applications and Digital Solutions. Megnax started out with an intrinsic strategy to bring technical excellence as well as better aesthetics to large scale enterprise solutions and corporate products that help them achieve business objectives.

With a user centered, minified and technically sound end product; we are an aspiring, innovative and talented group of UI/UX Designers, Software Engineers and Web Technologists who love their work!!
